article.headline: Western Michigan 84, Bowling Green 62
article.story: KALAMAZOO, Mich. (AP) -- Brian Snider scored a career-high 28 points to lead Western Michigan to an 84-62 victory over Bowling Green on Saturday. Joe Reitz and Derek Fracalossi also reached double figures in scoring as the Broncos (4-8, 1-1 Mid-American) broke a three-game losing streak in their most lopsided win of the season. John Floyd led Bowling Green (5-7, 1-1) with 23 points. The Falcons lost for the first time in four games and lost to Western Michigan for the seventh consecutive time. Reitz achieved his second double-double of the season with 21 points and a season-high 13 rebounds. Fracalossi scored a career-high 11 points. Snider, the Mid-American Conference leader in assists, had a team-high five assists. He hit three of four 3-point shots and all seven of his free throws. Bowling Green's Martin Samarco, the No. 3 scorer in the conference, scored 14 points -- 3.8 fewer than his average. Mawel Soler added 10 points and five assists. Western Michigan rallied from an early nine-point deficit for the win, going 7-for-10 from 3-point range in the first half and securing a 19-point turnaround in a 13-minute stretch. The Falcons led 13-4 after hitting their first six shots of the game. The Broncos, playing at home for the first time in nearly a month, made 54.4 percent of their shots, including 16 of 28 in the second half. Bowling Green shot 40.4 percent.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
